title: How to Catch Cobalion, Terrakion, and Virizion in Pokémon Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire

steps.title: Get the Eon Flute.
steps.content: Get the Eon Flute. You get the Eon Flute after completing the Primal Groudon/Kyogre storyline at Sootopolis City.

steps.title: Have three Pokémon in your team with maxed effort values (EVs).
steps.content: Have three Pokémon in your team with maxed effort values (EVs). Effort values are hidden points that your Pokémon receives for defeating enemy Pokémon. The more EVs you get for your Pokémon, the stronger it will be. The maximum amount of EVs a Pokémon can have is 510; with a maximum of 252 EVs being available for any given stat. See the article on how to EV Train Your Pokémon for help on maxing your Pokémon's EVs.

steps.title: Use the Eon Flute to summon Latios/Latias and soar into the sky.
steps.content: Use the Eon Flute to summon Latios/Latias and soar into the sky.

steps.title: Soar to Pacifidlog Town, and nearby, you'll find an island called the Pathless Plain.
steps.content: Soar to Pacifidlog Town, and nearby, you'll find an island called the Pathless Plain. Land on this island.

steps.title: Go through the path, and at the end, you'll find a portal.
steps.content: Go through the path, and at the end, you'll find a portal. Press A to interact with it, and say yes to the given question to face either Cobalion, Terrakion, or Virizion, depending on the day. Cobalion appears on Sundays, Wednesdays, and Fridays, Terrakion appears on Tuesdays and Saturdays, and Virizion appears on Mondays and Thursdays.
